Pre-Game Insights: Montenegro often do their best work on home soil and should have the upper hand over Wales.
Montenegro have won four of their last five matches in front of their fans.
Wales have now picked up just one win from their last seven matches and have struggled on their travels, winning just once in their last 10 away matches.
Steven Jovetic remains a vital player for Montenegro and has found the net in five of the last 10 international matches.
Kieffer Moore often features in attack for Wales and will be tasked with providing the cutting edge in front of goal.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Montenegro saw over 3.5 goals in their previous home fixture and a repeat is priced at 3/1 by Betfred.
Over 2.5 goals is priced at 11/10 by Betfred, who is also offering odds of 5/6 on both teams to score.
Montenegro have grabbed the opening goal in four of their last five home matches and could be backed to score first on Monday at 23/20 by Betfred.
